name: actions_set-actions-cache-usage-policy-for-enterprise
description:
Sets the GitHub Actions cache usage policy for an enterprise.
You must authenticate using an access token with the `admin:enterprise` scope to use this endpoint.
GitHub Apps must have the `enterprise_administration:write` permission to use this endpoint.

enterprise.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

actions-cache-usage-policy-enterprise.description: GitHub Actions cache usage policy for an enterprise.

max_repo_cache_size_limit_in_gb.description: For repositories in an enterprise, the maximum value that can be set as the limit for the sum of all caches in a repository, in gigabytes.

repo_cache_size_limit_in_gb.description: For repositories in an enterprise, the default size limit for the sum of all caches in a repository, in gigabytes.

actions-cache-usage-policy-enterprise.title: Actions cache usage policy for an enterprise
